content:
The defense forces of the South of Ukraine destroyed two felds of ammunition, two fortifications and an enemy's observation post.

About thisSaysin the telegram-channel of defense forces of southern Ukraine.

During the day, the defenders eliminated 228 invaders in the south, destroyed 14 guns and 39 units of auto-bronze.

Two units of special equipment, two boats and two reconnaissance UAVs were also destroyed.

"The defense forces continue to inflict fire damage on enemy deployments, firing positions and rear," the message says.

As reported by the Armyinform, Ukrainian soldiers in the past dayDestroyed810 occupiers, 34 guns and 19 tanks.
title: The Armed Forces destroyed two boats and several more units of Russian equipment in the south of Ukraine
description: This is stated in the Telegram channel of the Defense Forces of southern Ukraine.    During the day, the defenders...
author: Army Inform
